summary: The Farmers’ Market Expansion Act of 2025 aims to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002. The primary goal is to include tree nuts (including shelled tree nuts) as part of the items available under the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program. This change seeks to expand the program's offerings and potentially improve access to nutritious foods for senior citizens. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 26, 2025.
